body.p:
Owingsville Bath Co Jany 20th 61
Govenor Magoffin
Dear Sir

Enclosed please find a petition for J J Lightfoot and Sim Crain, for the purpose of remitting a fine for selling whiskey (good old Bourbon) you will please remit it as it is an article much in demand especially in these parts, where good liquor is scarce..
